name: Astral Project
description: In a world where reality is one of the scariest thing someone could think about, why not escape to a land where you can fight to keep yourself occupied.  In this game you tap all your problems away against 4 levels of villains.  Interpret each battle however you would like. I designed this game as a stress reliever to get over the stressful things like final projects and too much studying so i hope you enjoy.
